name: Space-Escape
description:
This is Space-Escape game.

Credits:

Created by Farit Shakur.

Modified:

1) Add death by falling from highest

2) Restart button in Pause, Win Panel and Lose Panel

3) Add Timer (in level  3)

4) Add boom level (Blast wave hunting to you in level 2)

5) Add version for androind 

You can play this game in browser version on your mobile device (there is mobile controllers).

I didn't add 2 WebGL (for PC and mobile)   so if you open game on PC you still will see mobile controllers.
